item.title: Remote Controlled Lawn Mower Analysis Motor Controller2
item.description:
After a long delay being busy with office work and some things around the home I finally got back to the lawn mover.

The controllers I had procured had some issues. For example some of the controllers would not like my pwm signal controls for some reason. I bought the controller chips on the board and after replacing them the PWM feature seemed to work. I am contemplating if I should in fact use the PWM signal or just drive it using the analog pin.

item.title: Remote Controlled Lawn Mower - Analysis - Motor Controller
item.description: This article explores the different motor controller choices.

item.title: Remote Controlled Lawn Mower - Analysis - Wheel and motor
item.description: This article explores the wheel choices we have for the RC lawn mower.

item.title: Remote Controlled Lawn Mower - Analysis of mower
item.description: This article shares intent to convert a gasoline lawn mover to a remote controlled lawn mower and what questions need to be answered to proceed with the design.
